home.subtitle: Medior Software Engineer with CTO Experience

mpm.problem: A U.S.-based startup needed a scalable matchmaking platform.
mpm.solution: Led backend architecture, DevOps pipelines, and team management. Built the core system with Laravel & React.
mpm.impact: Successfully launched to U.S. users with a secure, production-ready platform.

vs.problem: A Swiss healthcare company required a secure SaaS app with multilingual support.
vs.solution: Designed backend with Laravel & MySQL, implemented CI/CD with GitHub Actions, and oversaw cloud deployments.
vs.impact: Delivered a fully functional SaaS platform trusted by healthcare providers in Switzerland.

ak.problem: Needed a modern, fast, and SEO-optimized personal brand website.
ak.solution: Designed and built full-stack with Laravel & custom UI, focusing on mobile performance and SEO.
ak.impact: Delivered a high-performance personal brand site.

mk.problem: Required multi-language support for a German/English user base.
mk.solution: Implemented full localization & translation workflows to make the platform accessible across regions.
mk.impact: Expanded usability and increased adoption across Austria and Germany.

cb.problem: A European energy startup needed a platform to automate billing and financial management for decentralized, green energy communities in a user-friendly way.
cb.solution: Built a demo proof-of-concept: multi-tenant billing workflows, member administration, analytics dashboards, and demo booking flow. Backend with Spring Boot + PostgreSQL and an intuitive UI/UX aligned to Colibrie’s brand.
cb.impact: Showcased a scalable MVP for automated energy community management—founding, managing, and analyzing energy hubs with ease.

contact.sub: Looking for a mid-level full-stack software engineer, or CTO-level consultant? Let’s talk.

services.lead: I help companies design and deliver secure, scalable, and future-proof software systems.

backend.title: Backend Engineering
backend.desc: Laravel, Spring Boot (Kotlin), REST APIs, Redis

fullstack.title: Full-Stack Development
fullstack.desc: Laravel + React, Inertia.js, complete web solutions

devops.title: DevOps & Automation
devops.desc: Docker, CI/CD pipelines, NGINX, Hetzner deployments

lead.title: Leadership & Mentorship
lead.desc: CTO-level guidance, Agile team leadership, code reviews

about.intro: I’m a full-stack engineer specializing in backend systems, scalable infrastructures, and end-to-end product delivery. With hands-on experience as a CTO, backend team lead, and independent developer, I combine technical depth with leadership and strategy.
about.closing: I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and delivering business value through technology.

fallback.message: Sorry, the page you’re looking for doesn’t exist.
